title: New: Liyv – Splintered Arms
content:
This is mesmerising.

Seattle’s Liyv is releasing one song a month, and her latest offering, Splintered Arms is wonderfully composed yet poignantly fragile, likely to draw comparisons to the likes of Kiiara and the early Lapsley demos. Check it out below.

Like this? Follow our On Repeat Playlist for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
